title: Fleshtone
overview: Matthew Greco is fascinated by death. As a successful artist, he paints gruesome portraits of murders and suicides. Yet, despite his success, he is unhappy and alone. In desperation, he answers a phone sex ad and becomes entangled with Edna; a woman who seems to share his morbid desires and strange needs.  They decide to meet one another in person, but the rendezvous goes horribly wrong when Matthew finds Edna dead â€“ or is it Edna?
